paragraph: Bill Nace is an experimental guitarist. Nace has collaborated with Joe McPhee, Steve Gunn, Thurston Moore, Yoko Ono, Okkyung Lee, and Kim Gordon. With Gordon, Nace is part of the experimental electric guitar duo Body/Head.
Body/Dilloway/Head (with Aaron Dilloway; Three Lobed Recordings, 2021)With X.O.4
